page.title: 08Tourism in & around Coniston
page.content:
Every summer, thousands of visitors come to Coniston to enjoy the scenery of lake and mountains. There are 4 {hotels}in the village, and a great number of{guest houses}and{bed & {breakfast}places. There are 3{caravan {sites;}Coniston Hall Farm, Park Coppice and Pier Cottage, as well as places that have one, two or more caravans to let. In addition to the main{campsite}at Coniston Hall, there are other places for campers to stay in and around the village.
The main attractions of this area for holidaymakers are:{natural beauty, {peace and quiet,}and opportunity for many kinds of{recreation.}The tourist season begins in April and ends in September, though there are always some visitors out of season.
